title: Volcanic eruptions - people affected worldwide up to 2016
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Location and Date, and Number of victims in each Location and Date on the y axis.

The Number of victims is appeared to be the highest at Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) and lowest at Location and Date Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002).
The Number of victims of Location and Date Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002) is 7.55% smaller than the maximum value at Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991).
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Location and Date, and Number of victims in each Location and Date on the y axis.
Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) has the highest Number of victims and Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002) has the lowest Number of victims.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of victims for 10 number of Location and Dates.

The Number of victims is appeared to be the highest at Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) and lowest at Location and Date Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002).
Location and Date  has the second highest value for Number of victims.

The maximum Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) has got 7.55 times higher Number of victims than the minimum Location and Date Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002).

Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) is higher than any other Location and Dates with value 1036065.0, followed by , and Volcanic eruption in Nicaragua (April 9 1992). Down to Location and Date Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002) with the lowest value 137140.0.
The average Number of victims in all 10 Location and Dates is 368530.4.
The Number of victims is 3685304.0 if we add up values of all Location and Dates.

data.Location and Date: Volcanic eruption in Papua New Guinea (September 19 1994)
